title: Sunny Iceland: land of the vikings
brief_description: Shows the life of the people of barren but surprisingly warm Iceland: the green-houses which use hot springs; and the major industries, fishing and whaling.
description: Shows the life of the people of barren but surprisingly warm Iceland: the green-houses which use hot springs; and the major industries, fishing and whaling.
